about_the_game:
The Hardest Game In The World !!!!!!


This is the valley of heroes, here countless warriors have died for the sake of exaltation. the balance, speed and quick thinking skills of heroes are tested here.And you Zekaros, are you one of the thousands who came here and waste their lives in order to attain greatness, or are you the greatest warrior of all time?
HOW TO PLAY

W,A,S,D = Movement

Space Bar = Jump

Overcome obstacles and complete the parkour but it will be harder than you think. Tough traps, obstacles that require timing, you can try to finish but you can’t

Do You Think You Can Finish This Game?

  • Thorny and memorize-needed parkours.

  • Use your reflexes!

  • Fast and non-stop gameplay.

  • Race against time.

  • No checkpoints! Gotta finish without any minor wrong move.

Are You That Talented?

Unusual tracks, obstacles that want reflexes, try this game if you're confident!

But I warn you, this is the hardest game in the world

Finish the game and tag us on twitter and prove us wrong, if you can

name: THGITW

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.0 GHz veya AMD 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 9.0c compliant video card with 128MB RAM and Pixel Shader 3.0 (NVIDIA 6600 or better/ATI X1300 or better, excluding ATI X1550)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Hardest Game In The World Nobody Can Finish This Game!!!!!!
